marklogic.body: It is good the law was struck because the legislators will have to make a cleaner law, one without so many riders to votes. Congress works for the people and this adding give aways to Gain votes is bad policy. What law could possibly stand if one section that was written to get a vote necessary to get the legislation over the top and threw congress? If that part was struck and it was what made enough votes then the rest did not get enough votes and would not have passed.There are already fixes being enacted to the system. Saw a CBS news Spot on a physician opening a clinic in a strip mall to cover patients without insurance. Her overhead did not require her to charge some outrageous amount. There was a PBS show on how hospitals were making changes so they could still be profitable and were getting effective results.
